00011 #include "GainDataspace.h"
00012 #include <math.h>

00015 
00016 LinearAmplitudeUnit::LinearAmplitudeUnit()
00017         : DataspaceUnit("linear")
00018 {;}
00019 
00020 
00021 LinearAmplitudeUnit::~LinearAmplitudeUnit()
00022 {;}
00023 
00024 
00025 void LinearAmplitudeUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00026 {
00027         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00028         
00029         *output = atom_getfloat(inputAtoms);
00030         // avoid negative valus that might blow up some convertions
00031         if (*output<0)
00032                 *output = 0;
00033 
00034 }
00035 
00036 
00037 void LinearAmplitudeUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00038 {
00039         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00040         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, *input);
00041 }

00044 /***********************************************************************************************/
00045 MidiGainUnit::MidiGainUnit()
00046         : DataspaceUnit("midi")
00047 {;}
00048 
00049 
00050 MidiGainUnit::~MidiGainUnit()
00051 {;}
00052                 
00053 
00054 void MidiGainUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00055 {
00056         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00057         // This is the old formula behaving the same as the gain~ object:
00058         // *output =  pow(10., (atom_getfloat(inputAtoms)-127.)*0.03);
00059         // Now substituted for:
00060         *output = pow(atom_getfloat(inputAtoms)*0.01,kGainMidiPower);
00061 }
00062 
00063 
00064 void MidiGainUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00065 {
00066         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00067         // This is the old formula behaving the same as the gain~ object:
00068         // atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, log10(*input)*33.333333333333+127.);
00069         // Now substituted for:
00070         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, 100.*pow((*input),kGainMidiPowerInv));
00071 }
00072 
00073 
00074 /***********************************************************************************************/
00075 DecibelUnit::DecibelUnit()
00076         : DataspaceUnit("dB")
00077 {;}
00078 
00079 
00080 DecibelUnit::~DecibelUnit()
00081 {;}
00082                 
00083                 
00084 void DecibelUnit::convertToNeutral(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, double *output)
00085 {
00086         *outputNumArgs = 1;
00087         *output = pow(10., atom_getfloat(inputAtoms)*0.05);
00088 }
00089 
00090 
00091 void DecibelUnit::convertFromNeutral(long inputNumArgs, double *input, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00092 {
00093         *outputNumArgs = 1;     
00094         atom_setfloat(*outputAtoms, log10(*input)*20.);
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00098 /***********************************************************************************************/
00099 GainDataspace::GainDataspace()
00100         : DataspaceLib("gain", "linear")
00101 {
00102         // Create one of each kind of unit, and cache them in a hash
00103         registerUnit(new LinearAmplitudeUnit,   gensym("linear"));
00104         registerUnit(new MidiGainUnit,                  gensym("midi"));
00105         registerUnit(new DecibelUnit,                   gensym("dB"));
00106         
00107         // Now that the cache is created, we can create a set of default units
00108         setInputUnit(neutralUnit);
00109         setOutputUnit(neutralUnit);
00110 }
00111 
00112 
00113 GainDataspace::~GainDataspace()
00114 {
00115         ;
00116 }
